Before you dive into the game, there are a few settings you need to configure:
Enter the maximum number you want to use in the arithmetic problems. This allows you to control the difficulty level of the game. and Choose the type of arithmetic operation you want to practice. You can select addition, subtraction, multiplication, division,
or a combination of all four. Simply click on the corresponding button to make your selection.
Once you've made these selections, press the 'Start' button to begin the game. Remember, the goal is to solve each problem as quickly as possible. The clock is ticking, so think fast!
); } export default Choose
